'''2.0.774-stage''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), or '''2.0.775-stage''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on February 8, 2017.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-41}}: Windows launcher does not remember window position on close.
* {{bug|MCL-1324}}: Launcher forced resize on login with existing account.
